Without this import, Lean does not know that normed groups are topological groups.
I'm putting this in this file, since the `MetricSpace (SeparationQuotient _)` instance is defined next to the `MetricSpace (Additive _)` instance, and this is consistent.

pullRequest.title: feat: add `Normed` instances for SeparationQuotient
